title: Chapter 1889 - The Immortal Peach Assembly
body:
Chapter 1889 - The Immortal Peach Assembly

Some of them discussed Su Yi’s accomplishments over the past years. Others tried to analyze what had happened in the Dragon Palace to glean insight into the extent of Su Yi’s abilities. Others just simmered in anxiety, convinced that Su Yi was all but certain to meet with disaster at the Immortal Peach Assembly.

In summary, all of the discussion revolved around Su Yi.

By now, everyone knew about how Su Yi had ascended to the Jing Province’s Ascension Pool on White Deer Mountain, as well as what he’d accomplished throughout the Immortal Realm in the years that followed. And everyone who learned of his accomplishments was left tongue-tied. They couldn’t have been any more astonished. 

Su Yi had arrived here not yet an immortal, but in just a few short years, he’d broken into the Universe Realm, the Void Realm, the Saint Realm, and the Miracle Realm in rapid succession. He was already an Immortal King.

The most terrifying part was that his combat prowess was simply heaven-defying. He could kill Great Martial cultivators with ease and even fight back against Great Unity cultivators!

His accomplishments seemed all but impossible. Were he anyone else, everyone would have turned up their noses and dismissed the stories as...
